name: jnj-lib-doc

scripts.build: npm run build:cjs & npm run build:esm
scripts.clean: del .\cjs\*.ts && del .\cjs\*.js && del .\cjs\*.map && del .\esm\*.ts && del .\esm\*.js && del .\esm\*.map

description: JnJ Utility Library For Documents(Yaml, Csv, Xlsx, ...) in Typescript
author: Jnj Soft Ko <jnjsoft.ko@gmail.com>
